narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Liberty Ride LLC is a Non-emergency Medical Transport (VAN) provider based in Worcester, MA. From 2018-01 through 2018-10, this provider received $246K in Medicaid payments across 3K claims serving 1K beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 3.5× the national median for A0130 (A0130), at $102 per claim vs. the median of $29. This places them well above the 99th percentile nationally.
76% of billing is concentrated in A0130 (A0130), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2018-10, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
